item.title: Cleaned Czar v2.0
item.dc:creator: @irlegitir irlegitir
item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

I need help with adding method, I downloaded the cleaned czar v2.0 source but it doesn’t have makeGloalObject.

I added this:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
		for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
			if(p != null){
				client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){
				if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	}
        public void NewObjects() {
		makeGlobalObject(9999, 9999, 2783, 0, 10);
	}

I compiled with no errors, teled there and there was no object. Anyone know the problem? Thanks

Read full topic
